modules.title: Company-Specific Focus Areas
topics: Company-specific interview formats and evaluation criteria
Targeted algorithm patterns for each company
Mock interview practice with company-specific feedback
practice: Complete mock interviews focusing on each company's style
Review detailed interview experiences on Glassdoor/Blind
Practice answering behavioral questions using the STAR method

amazon: Leadership Principles (14 principles) and behavioral preparation
OOP design and system design with microservices
meta: Behavioral questions focusing on impact and growth
netflix: Streaming algorithms and content delivery networks

interviewStyles.amazon: Heavy emphasis on behavioral questions based on Leadership Principles
interviewStyles.google: Emphasis on algorithmic efficiency and optimal solutions
interviewStyles.meta: Focus on coding fluency and practical problem-solving
interviewStyles.apple: Strong emphasis on clarity of thought and user-centered thinking
interviewStyles.netflix: Focus on senior-level architectural thinking and systems knowledge

finalWeekChecklist: Complete 3-5 full mock interviews for each target company
Review all common algorithms and data structures
Practice explaining your thought process clearly
Prepare 5-7 strong behavioral stories that can adapt to different questions
Research recent news about your target companies
Prepare thoughtful questions to ask your interviewers
Establish a pre-interview routine (sleep, food, mental preparation)
Test your technical setup for virtual interviews
Practice whiteboard coding if interviews will be in-person
postInterviewStrategy: Send thank-you notes to interviewers within 24 hours
Document all questions asked for future reference
Reflect on your performance and areas for improvement
Have a follow-up plan if you don't hear back within the expected timeframe
Continue practicing while waiting for results
